mapper.insert: insert into member (id,pw,name,age,rrNum1, rrNum2, phoneNum, userAddr1,userAddr2,userAddr3,email) values (#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{age},#{rrNum1},#{rrNum2}, #{phoneNum},#{userAddr1},#{userAddr2},#{userAddr3},#{email})
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, age = #{age} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
select * from member where name = #{name} and phoneNum = #{phoneNum}
select * from member where id = #{id} and name = #{name} and rrNum1 = #{rrNum1} and email = #{email}
